signIn.title: Welcome Back
signIn.description: Enter your credentials to access your account

signUp.title: Create an account
signUp.description: Enter your personal data to create your account.

profile.title: Set up your public profile
profile.description: Add your profile picture, bio, and location so clients can find and trust you.

portfolio.title: Upload your portfolio
portfolio.description: Showcase your best work. We recommend at least 10 high-quality images.

service.title: Create your first service
service.description: Define a package, like a "Portrait Session," with a price and details.

profileUnderReview.title: Your profile is under review
profileUnderReview.subtitle: Typically reviewed in 2-3 business days
profileUnderReview.footer: Questions? Check our help center for more info.

submission.title: Submission received
submission.description: We've got your profile and it's queued for review.

review.title: Our team reviews your portfolio
review.description: We'll check your images, services, and profile details.

approval.title: Get approved and go live
approval.description: We'll email you at {email} when approved.

settings.title: Settings
settings.caption: Manage your details and personal preferences here

general.title: General
general.description: Manage your general account settings and preferences

email.title: Email
email.description:
Your email address. Contact support
to change it.

language.title: Language
language.description: Choose your preferred language for the interface

theme.title: Appearance
theme.description: Switch between light and dark modes for the interface

profile.title: Profile
profile.description: Update your photo and personal details

profilePhoto.title: Profile photo
profilePhoto.description: This photo will be visible to others

about.title: About you
about.description: Write a description for your profile

experience.title: Experience
experience.description: How many years you've been shooting

locations.title: Locations
locations.description: Cities or regions where clients can book you

languages.title: Languages
languages.description: Languages you can comfortably use with clients

personalWebsite.title: Personal website
personalWebsite.description: Your online page, blog, or company site

errors.saveFailed: Failed to save changes. Please check the errors above.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.caption: Organize your photography work into collections

dialog.title: Create new collection
dialog.description: A collection is a group of photos from a single project. Fill in the details below to add a new one to your portfolio.

empty.title: Start building your portfolio

description.line1: Create your first collection to professionally organize your
description.line2: photos and present your work to potential clients with ease

empty.noResults: No collections found matching your filters.

empty.title: No photos in this collection yet
empty.description: Start building your collection by uploading your first photos. You can drag and drop files or click to browse.
empty.alternativeUpload: You can also drag and drop files anywhere on this page

uploadDialog.title: Upload photos
uploadDialog.description: Add high-quality images to showcase this collection

uploadZone.dragText: Drag and drop an image or
uploadZone.fileTypes: JPEG, PNG or WEBP up to 45 MB

general.name: General
general.description: Manage the general settings of your collection
general.title: Edit Collection Details
general.caption: Update the name, description, and other details.

visibility.name: Access & Visibility
visibility.description: Manage the access and visibility of your collection
visibility.title: Collection Privacy
visibility.caption: Choose who can see your collection.

public.label: Public
public.description: Visible on your public profile and in search results.

private.label: Private
private.description: Only visible to you and anyone with the private share link.

dangerZone.name: Danger Zone
dangerZone.description: Manage the danger zone of your collection
dangerZone.title: Delete this collection
dangerZone.caption: Once you delete a collection, you cannot get it back. All photos and data associated with it will be permanently removed.

services.title: Services
services.caption: Create service packages available to your clients

dialog.title: Create a service
dialog.description: Create service packages that your clients can book. Fill in the details below to add a new service to your offerings.

visibility.label: Visibility
visibility.description: When enabled this service will be visible to any visitor of the platform

archiveDialog.title: Archive "{name}"?
archiveDialog.description: This service will be hidden from your public profile and new clients. You can find and restore it any time from the Archived tab.

hero.title: Your Marketplace for
hero.subtitle: Find and book your perfect photographer for any occasion. Connect with top photography talent across Ukraine.

search.title: Search for your perfect match
search.description: Tailored talent matches to help you hire the right person faster

searchPage.title: Find Photographers
searchPage.description: Find the perfect photographer for your needs.
searchPage.resultsCount: {count, plural, one {# photographer matches your needs} other {# photographers match your needs}}

footer.description: The easiest way to find and book professional photographers for any occasion. Built for quality and trust.
